titles.title: Recognizing Doris "Granny D" Haddock, who inspired millions of people through remarkable acts of political activism, and extending the condolences of Congress on the death of Doris "Granny D" Haddock.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/16/2010--Introduced. Extends condolences to the family of political activist Doris "Granny D" Haddock.
